details.title: Test Creation and Maintaining
details.description: Learned how to create automatic tests to ensure complex UI elements worked correctly with an in house framework and Gauge, which had not been used yet. Taught team how to use this new framework with a series of meetings.

details.title: Full Stack Web Development
details.description: Took part in creating complex UI elements, adding backend code code to allow said UI elements to pull data using RESTful controllers and learned to use technologies like Jenkins to seamlessly deploy changes to production and test environments.

details.title: Incident Management
details.description: Used SQL with technologies like TOAD to query Oracle databases to diagnose/fix issues in production and test environments.

details.title: Azure
details.description: Created and managed a VM used to host the Kafka component of the system. The VM was configured with the necessary software and the ability to support many users concurrently.

details.title: Peer Mentor
details.description: Trained our team of five peers how to operate an Azure VM to minimize its costs. Mentored team on how to use Github and follow industry practices.
